original: intros h st t n pli plt es ci st' ps H. unfold handleAppendEntries in H. destruct (t <? currentTerm st). - inversion H. reflexivity. - destruct (prevLogIndex =? 0). -- destruct (haveNewEntries st entries). ++ inversion H. reflexivity. ++ inversion H. reflexivity. -- destruct (log st). ++ inversion H. reflexivity. ++ inversion H. reflexivity.
